data.name: The Exterminator
data.detail: Normal space ship.

data.name: The Dark Destroyer
data.detail: Opponent may draw 2 cards when this enters play.

data.name: Stormfalcon
data.detail: Normal space ship.

data.name: Titan
data.detail: Normal space ship.

data.name: Explosive Missile
data.detail: Normal missile.

data.name: Fast Missile
data.detail: Can move the first turn.

data.name: EMP Missile
data.detail: Destroys Energy Shield or paralyzes space ship (turn the card and it cannot do anything until repaired).

data.name: Nuclear Missile
data.detail: Each turn can either move or attack but not both.

data.name: Full Attack
data.detail:
路 +1 attack value of your space ships.
路 Your space ships can move the first turn     they enter play.

data.name: Good Karma
data.detail: Draw 3 extra cards in your draw phase, then after your draw phase discard 1 card from your hand.

data.name: Neutralization
data.detail: No other duration card has any effect.

data.name: Over Capacity
data.detail: You have no maximum hand size.

data.name: Excellent work
data.detail:
Put down this card as an extra station card.
[ OR ] Draw 3 cards.

data.name: Supernova
data.detail: All cards except station cards are destroyed. Each player receives 3 station damage.

data.name: Target Missed
data.detail: Play this card directly during enemy attack from space ship (not colisision, missile or cannon) to make it fail.

data.name: Missiles Launched
data.detail: Find 2 missile cards (red cards) from your draw or discard pile and play them without cost. Shuffle the draw pile if searched.

data.name: Perfect Plan
data.detail: Search for a card from the draw pile, discard pile or station cards and put it into your hand. Shuffle the draw pile if searched.

data.name: Pursuiter
data.detail: Can after first turn be sacrificed instead of attacking to deal 4 damage to target in same zone (collision).

data.name: Grand Opportunity
data.detail: Draw 5 cards and then discard 1 card from your hand.

data.name: Energy Shield
data.detail: Protects base station. (You can only have one Energy Shield in play at the same time.)

data.name: Defense Cannon
data.detail:
Normal cannon.
(Defense cards cannot move)

data.name: Trigger-Happy Joe
data.detail: Can attack 2 times per turn.

data.name: Thunderbolt
data.detail: Normal space ship.

data.name: The Gladiator
data.detail: Normal space ship.

data.name: The Shade
data.detail: The Shade cannot be attacked if it has not been attacking this turn.

data.name: Hunter
data.detail: Can move the first turn.

data.name: Small Repair Ship
data.detail: Can instead of doing attack repair 1 station damage or 3 other damage. Can move the first turn.

data.name: Big Repair Ship
data.detail: Can instead of doing attack repair 1 station damage or 5 other damage.

data.name: Luck
data.detail:
Counter target card costing 2 or less.
[ OR ] Draw 2 cards.

data.name: Battlestar
data.detail: Normal space ship.

data.name: Avoid
data.detail: Discard this card from table to counter card being played.

data.name: Disturbing Sensor
data.detail:
路 Enemy missiles can't move or attack.
路 If opponent after draw phase has more   than 1 card in hand, he or she           discards a card.

data.name: Fatal Error
data.detail:
Destroy any card in play (on the table including station cards).
Your opponent may draw 2 cards.

data.name: Deadly Sniper
data.detail:
Long distance shooter.
(Can after the first turn shoot targets in enemy zone from home zone)

data.name: Discovery
data.detail: Draw 3 cards and the opponent draws 2 cards. [ OR ] Discard 1 card and the opponent discards 2 cards.

data.name: The Liberator
data.detail: Normal space ship.

data.name: Destiny Decided
data.detail: No player can play any event (orange) card.

data.name: Expansion
data.detail:
Your opponent may draw 2 cards.
You can play 2 extra station cards this turn.

data.name: Sabotage
data.detail: Opponent may draw 1 card. See the cards from the opponents hand and then discard 1 card from hand or flipped station card.
